TopicTitle: All robotics parts start spasming on craft reload

Articles.Content:
Upon first time loading the robotics parts work great.

After reloading the craft (going to tracking station and back again) the parts seem to be fine at first, but when I click on one of the sliders to change an angle, extension, etc, every robotics part on the entire craft begins to freak out. They all start extending/retracting at random.

Anyone else encountered this bug or has a fix for it?

I have same problem, happens more in space than ground. Toggling the Lock on all the robotic parts seems to fix it for that load in. It seems to happen more when the parts are locked, so i've taken to avoid using the lock.
